nodes.text: One of the many towers that made up the Royal Palace in Theed, the capital city of the planet Naboo, was built under the rule of King Veruna during his thirteen year reign and housed a vast library. During the Clone Wars, an abduction attempt on Supreme Chancellor Palpatine occurred around the bottom of Veruna's tower.

Veruna's tower first appeared in the 1999 movie Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The tower was present in conceptual drawings for the films as early as April 1998, when the movie underwent its second shooting phase.
